title: Did the Marine Corps tell Pelause: " We don't work for you? '
subtitle: The security arrangements for the inauguration of President-elect Joe Baiden of the United States were monitored following the violent mutiny of the Capitol on 6 January 2021.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: General David H. Berger, commander of the United States Marine Corps, rejected the request of the United States House of Representatives to use the Marines as security for President-elect Joe Biden on 20 January 2021, saying: "We are not working for you!" He added that the Marines only receive orders from President Donald Trump.
